name: Conway's game of life (DaewooMatiz)
description:
Controls:

P - Pause/Resume game

B - Set speed to fast

N - Set speed to medium

M - Set speed to slow

X - Infinite life

C - Normal life

Q - Set game for 5 generations

W - Set game for 10 generations

E - Set game for 100 generations

R - Set game for 1000 generations

Left click - cell spawner

Enjoy!
